title: pop in bologna
description: the present work is aimed at analysing pop bands phenomenon in Italy, with a particular focus on the scena bolognese

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?label)  (COUNT(?label) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q215380. 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q38  . 
     ?band wdt:P2031 ?date .          
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en/it".
          ?band rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?count ?date
ORDER BY ?label

dynamic_elements.action_title: show other bands from this genre

dynamic_elements.text: Pooh is a successful Italian pop band which was formed in Bologna, in 1966. Songs Dammi solo un minuto and Uomini Sempre are instances of their successful career.

Stadio is an Italian band which was formed in Bologna a decade later, in 1977. They started out as Lucio Dalla’s supporting band, who featured them in his Anidride Solforosa album. Their breakthrough arrived when they produced Verdone’s Acqua e Sapone (1983) soundtrack.

They worked with artists covering an essential role in the scena bolognese such as Lucio Dalla, Gianni Morandi, Francesco Guccini, Vasco Rossi and Luca Carboni. They won Sanremo Music Festival in 2016, with song Un giorno mi dirai.

Lunapop formed in 1999 and split up in 2002. 

Among them, frontman Cesare Cremonini pursued a career in music along with bassist Nicola "Ballo" Balestri.

Lunapop won the Festival di San Marino with song Qualcosa di Grande, which allowed them to be scouted by an indie label, which produced their album Squerez. Their debut single, 50 Special, has become an Italian cult. Other singles include Un Giorno Migliore, Se Ci Sarai, Resta con Me and Vorrei.

Lo Stato Sociale is an Italian band formed in 2009, in Bologna.

Lo Stato Sociale was the runner-up in Festival di Sanremo 2018, with their song Una Vita in Vacanza.

It’s not uncommon for artists to travel the world in order to find recording studios whose atmosphere inspires them the most. For instance, on February 2023, Cesare Cremonini flew to Seattle to record his new album at Robert Lang Studios in Shoreline, where Nirvana would record their songs. Whereas Maggese (2005) was entirely recorded between the Abbey Road Studios and the Olympic Studios in London. Similarly, La Ragazza del Futuro (2022) was recorded at the Abbey Road Studios.

Bologna is commonly known as la Grassa, la Rossa, la Dotta. Theatres have always contributed to the cultural turmoil of the city. Bolognese artists have therefore shown deep fondness for theatres. For instance, Lo Stato Sociale used their exhibition at the Festival di Sanremo 2021 to appeal for a re-opening of theatres. Cesare Cremonini, on the other hand, self-financed his Maggese Theatre Tour.

"Gli applausi in un teatro hanno un suono particolare, ti piovono addosso come un temporale improvviso. Ma la cosa più emozionante è stata riuscire a far scoppiare a ridere il pubblico con una battuta. É un sogno che mi portavo dietro fin da bambino, quando all'asilo mettevo tutti i miei compagni di giochi sulle scale e cercavo di farli ridere rendendomi ridicolo"

Cesare Cremonini at the end of the Maggese Theatre Tour

dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?point ?pointLabel ?villeIdLabel ?lat ?long
WHERE
{
  ?point wdt:P31 wd:Q24354. #theatre
  ?point wdt:P131 ?villeId.
  ?point p:P625 ?statement.
  ?statement psv:P625 ?node.
  ?node wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat.
  ?node wikibase:geoLongitude ?long.
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
}

map_filters.map_filter_title: SELECT DISTINCT ?point ?filter ?filterLabel WHERE { ?point wdt:P31 wd:Q24354; wdt:P17 wd:Q38 . ?point wdt:P131 ?filter. ?filter rdfs:label ?filterLabel . FILTER(LANG(?filterLabel) = '' || LANGMATCHES(LANG(?filterLabel), 'en')). }
